mapper.select: select lig.light_name, yl.cyl, cyl.cyl, ph.sph, sph.sph, lt.lightbelow, ltb.lightbelow, m.mfrsname,b.brandname,u.unitnum, j.`id`,j.`produc_num`,j.`produc_code`,j.`produc_name`,j.`mfrsid`,j.`brandid`,j.`brandnum`,j.`factory`,j.`produc_factory`, j.`proid`,j.`unitid`,j.`sph_id`,j.`span_id`,j.`cyl_id`,j.`sph_up`,j.`sph_down`,j.`sph_span`,j.`cyl_up`,j.`cyl_down`, j.`cyl_span`,j.`lightbelow_id`,j.`lightbelow_right`,j.`lightbelow_left`,j.`lens_id`,l.`lens_name`,j.`cycle`,j.`light_id`,pl.`light_name`, j.`gradual_id`,g.`gradual_name`,j.`refractivityid`,r.`refractivityvalue`,j.`function_id`,f.`function_name`,j.`combined_photometry`,j.`can`,j.`tax`,j.`tax_price`, j.`trade_price`,j.`transfer_price`,j.`retail_price`,j.`xsstate`,j.`state`,j.`classtype` from aa_jpdz j left join c_refractivity r on r.refractivityid = j.refractivityid left join p_light pl on pl.light_id = j.light_id left join p_lens l on l.lens_id = j.lens_id left join p_gradual g on g.gradual_id = j.gradual_id left join p_function f on f.function_id = j.function_id left join c_mfrs m on j.mfrsid=m.mfrsnum left join c_brand b on j.brandnum=b.brandnum and j.mfrsid=b.mfrsid left join c_unit u on u.unitid=j.unitid left join a_cyl yl on yl.cyl_id=j.cyl_up left join a_cyl cyl on cyl.cyl_id=j.cyl_down left join a_sph ph on ph.sph_id=j.sph_up left join a_sph sph on sph.sph_id=j.sph_down left join a_lightbelow lt on lt.lightbelow_id=j.lightbelow_left left join a_lightbelow ltb on ltb.lightbelow_id=j.lightbelow_right left join p_light lig on lig.light_id=j.light_id where j.id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_jpdz where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select brandid,brandnum ,brandname from c_brand where mfrsid=#{mfrsid} and goodsid=#{goodsid} group by brandid
select produc_num from aa_jpdz where produc_num=#{producNum} order by id
